TypeSignature.Value: public delegate void AnnotationAuthorChangedEventHandler(object sender, AnnotationAuthorChangedEventArgs e);
.class public auto ansi sealed AnnotationAuthorChangedEventHandler extends System.MulticastDelegate

Docs.summary: Represents the method that handles the <see cref="E:System.Windows.Annotations.Annotation.AuthorChanged"> event raised by the <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.Annotation> class.
